name: Hollow Hopper
description:
Uh oh, you seem to have fallen into some sort of hole. Maybe a well, an old grave, or maybe you got caught in a sinkhole while walking to the corner store. Nobody is really sure, but you know you must get out. With a little help from a ghost, you just might! Run, roll, hop, and dash your way out of the hollow!

This is my second published title that started as a GameDev.TV tutorial that I felt could use some extra features and polish to become a fast paced and fun game to play. I have a book full of future ideas to add and a story for progression, but I wanted to get a finished, albeit short, version out to gauge feedback from the public.

Please leave any and all feedback so that I can become a better programmer, pixel artist, and all around game developer! If you had so much fun you just can't stand it, I humbly ask that you donate what you can. This will not only motivate me to continue learning and creating, but also give me a reason to come back and fully flesh out this title. 

All credits can be viewed in game [TAB] as well as in the text file included with the download.

Thank you again for choosing to spend your time on my page and playing my game!

Update 1/23/23 - Fixed an issue with popping audio near green slimes. Also fixed some spelling errors and bound roll to 'K' as well as RMB for my nephew. I'm working on a solution for the player occasionally getting stuck in the wall when rolling.
